name: VGA to VGA cable, 18 inches, Kit | Dell USA
description: This short 460mm (18 inch) VGA cable is an ideal solution for connecting the video output of a VGA-enabled desktop to a VGA display when they are in close proximity to each other. The short length of the cable allows for very little excess that would have to be tied up. It is designed specifically to be used in conjunction with an OptiPlex Micro when the Micro is mounted on a Micro All-in-One Stand, Micro AIO Mount for E Series monitors, or the Micro Dual VESA Mount.
